def euclid(a ,  b):
    if a == 0:
        return b
    while a:
        b,a = a , b%a
    return b
cases = int(raw_input())
while cases:
    cases -= 1
    n,m = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    if n>=m:
        one = m-1
        two = n-1
    else:
        one = n-1
        two = m-1
    print euclid(one,two)+1
